images.caption: Figure 1.Overview of our proposed MoR framework. The MoR framework can be divided into two stages: (1) Thought Generation. As depicted in steps 2, 3, and 4, this includes selecting optimal reasoning chains, creating prompts, and filtering for correct responses.
